entry.title: Gesturing and Intercommunication
entry.summary: In the reality, in the intercommunication between people (eg., strange people you meet on street) is only symbolic. The main action is in the consciousness trying to understand the meaning of those symbolic acts and gestures. No need to rush over other people when meeting then. Just get in touch …
entry.content: In the reality, in the intercommunication between people (eg., strange people you meet on street) is only symbolic. The main action is in the consciousness trying to understand the meaning of those symbolic acts and gestures. No need to rush over other people when meeting then. Just get in touch and express your will.

entry.title: The benefit of Truth

entry.title: I Crossed to the Other Margin
entry.summary:
I have crossed to the other margin. After many time of practice, the teaching of masters, except for the Supreme Master of Mine have no more meaning to me.

The objective has been attained. I have no more flutuations.

I believe this is the begin of the Path. But I …
entry.content:
I have crossed to the other margin. After many time of practice, the teaching of masters, except for the Supreme Master of Mine have no more meaning to me.

The objective has been attained. I have no more flutuations.

I believe this is the begin of the Path. But I have no doubt that is the crossing of the margin.

entry.title: Interestellar (and This RPG)
entry.summary:
On this thursday or friday this boy could remember os his trans-stellar lineage.

Got himself on bed having a nightmare and calling for his stellar family. Woke up. Still lying down and doing his meditation practice as usual, he flied in his fertile imaginatin, and remembered of his origins.
entry.content:
On this thursday or friday this boy could remember os his trans-stellar lineage.

Got himself on bed having a nightmare and calling for his stellar family. Woke up. Still lying down and doing his meditation practice as usual, he flied in his fertile imaginatin, and remembered of his origins.

entry.title: “Know thyself”
entry.summary:
The saying that a man who knowns himself knows the universe is a true saying.

There is the “Circle of the Infinite Unviverse,” and it is contained in him.
entry.content:
The saying that a man who knowns himself knows the universe is a true saying.

There is the “Circle of the Infinite Unviverse,” and it is contained in him.

entry.title: A View on Magick Games
entry.summary: At the beginning you would like to play magic games so you would have some advantages over other men. It is like that, at the end of the path, you realized that this was really granted to you, but you was also prepared for this responsabiility.
entry.content: At the beginning you would like to play magic games so you would have some advantages over other men. It is like that, at the end of the path, you realized that this was really granted to you, but you was also prepared for this responsabiility.

entry.title: On my experience in Rio Grande do Sul
entry.summary:
I was thinking about my xperience in Rio Grande do Sul, it's deeply rooted tradition, the people behaviour here.

Also, the culture of drinking the Chimarrão (traditional beverage made of yerba mate)

It seems to me very significant to my life and human experience having arrived and lived here for …
entry.content:
I was thinking about my xperience in Rio Grande do Sul, it's deeply rooted tradition, the people behaviour here.

Also, the culture of drinking the Chimarrão (traditional beverage made of yerba mate)

It seems to me very significant to my life and human experience having arrived and lived here for these years.

entry.title: free breezes and universes
entry.summary:
All the breezes that need physical or concrete objects like musical videoclips are subject to the limitations of any other universes. I mean, they are universes like any other, their metareality only change to "high" or "low" by the characteristic of karma, merit or lack of merit.

So, I say …
entry.content:
All the breezes that need physical or concrete objects like musical videoclips are subject to the limitations of any other universes. I mean, they are universes like any other, their metareality only change to "high" or "low" by the characteristic of karma, merit or lack of merit.

So, I say, if you are devouting your time in creating transshifting metarealities, try as you can to avoid concrete objects (what was already created by others) in its idealizations and affirmation (or foundation), as they tend to imprision the conscience -and so, the inherent power- in creating freely.

entry.title: The Wise and the Fool
entry.summary: 'Wise' is a precise characteristic: a man is it or he isn't. The fool never changes.
entry.content: 'Wise' is a precise characteristic: a man is it or he isn't. The fool never changes.

entry.title: Philosophy and agendas
entry.summary:
Me, as a philosopher, cannot have any compromise with any agenda. As agendas are forms of viewing the life from a perspective, and a philosopher should look into the "human" life from a free "perspective".

Nothing ever was so funny as tagging this post.
entry.content:
Me, as a philosopher, cannot have any compromise with any agenda. As agendas are forms of viewing the life from a perspective, and a philosopher should look into the "human" life from a free "perspective".

Nothing ever was so funny as tagging this post.

entry.title: Choice
entry.summary:
“Choice” is potential. Choice x or choice y is putting that potential at an end.

A man studies a musical instrument for a while, then he says: “Ok, now, I am a musician.” But if now he is a musician what was he before? nothing? void? He was something, because …
entry.content:
“Choice” is potential. Choice x or choice y is putting that potential at an end.

A man studies a musical instrument for a while, then he says: “Ok, now, I am a musician.” But if now he is a musician what was he before? nothing? void? He was something, because we remember he was. Maybe he was that potential that when confined, is no potential anymore.

entry.title: Time is A Being
entry.summary: Time is vibration, time is a dimension. «"Now" is not time for classical, it is for Folk». Time changes and it is a vibration: different vibrations mark different time-marks. Man's vision (or perception, contemplation) on time should be corrected.
entry.content: Time is vibration, time is a dimension. «"Now" is not time for classical, it is for Folk». Time changes and it is a vibration: different vibrations mark different time-marks. Man's vision (or perception, contemplation) on time should be corrected.

entry.title: Technology as War Tools
entry.summary: It seems to me that tecnology and philosophy should be treated as war tools. Be it for attack, be it for defense, but when you bring them closer while being out of war, then you stain what is naturally perfect and immaculate.
entry.content: It seems to me that tecnology and philosophy should be treated as war tools. Be it for attack, be it for defense, but when you bring them closer while being out of war, then you stain what is naturally perfect and immaculate.

entry.title: What is a man
entry.summary: If you dissaprove the feminist agenda and have some specific point-of-view on these issues, then you should know how to categorize the differences between what is a men and what is a woman.
entry.content: If you dissaprove the feminist agenda and have some specific point-of-view on these issues, then you should know how to categorize the differences between what is a men and what is a woman.
